title: A beginner's introduction to Pydata: how to build a minimal recommendation engine.
summary:
In this tutorial we'll set ourselves the goal of building a minimal
recommendation engine, and in the process learn about Python's excellent
Pydata and related projects: numpy, pandas, and pytables.

A recommendation engine is a software system that analyzes large amounts
of transactional data and distills personal profiles to present its
users with relevant products/information/content.
